messages.message: Was creating a demo chatbot with a company's documentation for a GTM opportunity. The URL input feature makes it sooo much easier to add docs from a webpage :raised_hands::skin-tone-4: I now wish I could add multiple URLs in a list and import them all, or ideally have it crawl a sitemap :eyes: @Aayush @Rakesh

Agreed. I demoed a insurance regulation chatbot today. Most regulation is on a public website that is fairly well organized and periodically updated. Insurers and banks constantly need to compare policies and marketing materials to changing regulation.
That's awesome. Could you share some of the URLs here for these sites? If we're building bulk import/crawling, we can look into this!
@jean btw, would this be useful for the docsbot knowledge management?

https://govt.westlaw.com/calregs/Index?transitionType=Default&contextData=%28sc.Default%29 (https://govt.westlaw.com/calregs/Index?transitionType=Default&contextData=%28sc.Default%29) That's all CA regulations. Insurance regulations would be title 10 chapter 5
